snippet.title: Dancing With The Dead DLC - The Typing of The Dead: Overkill with voice recognition, Part 7
snippet.description:
Trying out the next DLC, with a cold. Lots of music related words and some suspiciously less related.

The Typing Of The Dead: Overkill:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/246580/
Dancing With The Dead DLC:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/286920/
Using Dragon NaturallySpeaking v11

Using AutoHotKey for the pickups:
http://www.autohotkey.com/

My AutoHotKey code:

;Ctrl-Alt-h activates the Tab key pressing
^!h::
Loop
{
Send {Tab}
sleep 500
 
if GetKeyState("Shift", "P") ; Looks to see if Shift is pressed
break  ; exits Loop if so
}
